## `{quarto-shinylive}`

```{shinylive-r}
#| standalone: true
library(shiny)

ui <- fluidPage(
   titlePanel("Hello Shiny!")
)

server <- function(input, output, session) {
  # code
}

shinyApp(ui, server)
```
